thread.title: Target.com: 2 Pairs of Women’s Sneakers ONLY $34.48 Shipped (My Sidekick Loves These)
thread.title_full: Target.com: 2 Pairs of Women’s Sneakers ONLY $34.48 Shipped (My Sidekick Loves These)

author: Erica (Silly Sidekick)
title: Target.com: 2 Pairs of Women’s Sneakers ONLY $34.48 Shipped (My Sidekick Loves These)
text:
Through March 4th, hop on over to Target.com where they are hosting a Buy 1 Get 1 50% off sale on Women’s Flip Flops and Canvas Sneakers ! You may be able to opt for free in-store pickup if available near you; otherwise, shipping is free on orders of $25 or more. OR – if you’re a Target REDcard holder , you’ll get FREE shipping on ANY size order and an additional 5% off your purchases!

If you’re in the market for a new pair of sneakers and would like a recommendation, my sidekick, Erica, loves these Women’s Mad Love Lennie Sneakers priced at $22.99 per pair. Consider buying 2 pairs and you’ll pay ONLY $34.48 shipped after the buy 1 get 1 50% off sale – ONLY $17.24 per pair!
These sneakers are super comfy and light and you can wear them with tank tops, loose shirts, shorts, skirts, jeans or pants. And , you can quickly slip them on and go – NO tying needed!
